Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Doripenem
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram-Negative MIC/Combo Panels with Doripenem for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-negative bacilli.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-negative bacilli, specifically for Doripenem concentrations of 0.008–32 mcg/ml.
